text: Charles-Elie Laprévotte (born 4 October 1992) is a French professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder. ==Career== Laprévotte made his debut in the Bundesliga for SC Freiburg on 27 August 2013 against Bayern Munich. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Association football midfielders Category:French footballers Category:Bundesliga players Category:2. title: Charles-Elie Laprévotte
